name: Ghostopus Pizzeria
description:
Overview:
Ghostopus Pizzeria is an arcade game built with a pizza-themed alt-controller. Catch toppings to increase your score. Play in normal or hard mode. Can you get the highest score?

Controls:
Use only left or right arrow key to play

Team:
Jaclyn Ngo - Programmer 
Audrey Webb - Programmer and Fabricator 
Matt Garcia - Fabricator
